name: DieO2
description:
What do you do when you're out of breath in space? 

Yeah, you guessed it right! You have to RUN! That is where DieO2 comes to your hands. DieO2 is a space-themed endless-runner video game where you get a chance to experience the tension of running out of the breath! 

  • Collect Oxygen tanks to maintain the Oxygen level for keep the breath.
  • Avoid different obstacles and hazards laid on your way by dodging, jumping and sliding.
  • Control your movements and watch out for corners.
  • Play with your friends to see who is the last person to stand keeping the breath!

Game is now available for PC Windows on Itch.io/dieo2

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

System Requirements (Pending)

DieO2 is developed in Unreal Engine 5 and graphic optimization settings haven't implemented yet in the version of v0.2. Therefore, please note that you may experience low frame rates depending on your device specifications. DieO2 team will update the next version with several improvements based on user feedback including graphic optimization settings to be adjusted for your specifications under Unreal Engine 5 technologies minimum requirements.

Additional Notes

P.S. DieO2 is a tiny video game developed by three members of RAM Studios as their first video game developed within 72 hour as a challenge, whose original disciplines were 3D art, animation art and concept art .
